desc: A ghostly wisp of air.

name: twik-man
desc: Tiny vicious humanoid riding a dragonfly.

name: garden gnome
desc: Standard variety garden gnome.

attack.dev: spell is enough dmg, so attack doesn't deal anything

desc: Must have escaped its jar.
They're tricksy.

name: big snake
desc: Intenstly venomous.

name: skeletal rat
desc: Even the dead rats are a problem...
Just wombatting around.

name: will o' wisp
desc: A gleaming orb of light.
It appears to be missing all its fleshy bits.

name: failed experiment
desc: Apparently some sort of long lost arcane experiment, with a mind of its own. It doesn't look friendly.

name: scarab
desc: Massive shimmering beetle with a projecting horn.
Covered from top to bottom in animal leathers.
flavor: Tries to divine headache in your future

desc: Older cousin of the gobchief you found on the treffil woods edges

flavor: You remind me of the babe.

desc: For the Horde!

name: orc chieftain
desc: The strongest orc in the whole tribe.
Slow and rotting corpse.
Wants to steal your stuff.
So lithe. So graceful.

name: hobbit slinger
flavor: How much damage could he do with just a sling?

name: dire bat
desc: That's one large bat.

name: dire rat
desc: Red eyes... that's different.
Tiny creature made from random pieces of scrap metal, animated by residual magical energy

name: spark eel
desc: So wriggly.

name: piranha school
desc: It's bitey.
They say those who die on the cold heights search the passes for mortals to join them.
Rangers aren't very good with people.

name: high elf
desc: Other elves are as newborns to their elder kin.

name: thangmor ranger
desc: All rangers travel far. Some farther than others.

name: eledin strongbow
desc: When Tenwick told Eledin the Ettinmoors couldn't be crossed in safety, the ranger picked up his bow and headed east.

name: gildella the lighthearted
desc: The elf Gildella had roamed the Ettinmoors for centuries when Eledin first crossed her path. Their path has been the same since then.
flavor: 'I thought the moors too wild for decent folk,' said Eledin in surprise. 'Oh?' replied Gildella, 'I hadn't noticed.'

desc: One isn't too bad. 100 can be a problem.
Wants to steal your stuff.

name: electric eel
desc: So wriggly.

name: arcane serpent
desc: Fiercely loyal when summoned by magic.

name: great barracuda
desc: It's bitey.

name: giant centipede
desc: Creepy crawly.
Blood sucking leech.
You see some undigested bones and jewels in its... 'belly'? Gross.
flavor: Eww, it doesn't even try to hold its form, just splashes acid everywhere.

name: bandit lord
desc: Armed, agile, and deadly. His purses are certainly filled to the brim.
flavor: All your loot are belong to him.

name: mechanical swordsman
desc: Durable, but not very good at its job.

name: scuttling crab
desc: A massive scuttling crab.
She doesn't look harpy to see you.

name: drunken boxer
desc: This monk has had a bit too much to drink...
Little demonic bastards.

name: large spider
desc: You can't tell if she looks hungry. Or what a spider the size of a dog would eat.

name: vampire bat
desc: It vants to zuck your blood.

name: sand mite
desc: Oversized parasites of the dunes.
An intelligent scavenger with the features of a vulture.
flavor: Vrrek is what most of their words sound like.

desc: Their globed hands glow with pale, unearthly light.
flavor: It is said they feed on darkness.

desc: Such a good-looking fellow!

name: giant snake
desc: Not venomous at all.

name: evil priest
desc: He worships evil.
She screams black obscenities.

name: wicked hierophant
desc: Leader of wicked congregation

name: palus the sinner
desc: Palus was a mere dabbler before unearthing the remains of a Dhrozen knight. Now he leads the Barrow priests.

name: magic blade
desc: It just floats there...
He's angry now!!!
Like a demonic humanoid vulture.

name: greater zombie
desc: It ate up all the smaller zombies.

name: shrieking eel
desc: Oversized eel with bladed teeth and a terrifying screach.
Its contorted purple body can hide in the smallest crevices.
flavor: A dwarp can hear the drip of water through 100 feet of solid rock.
Ever wonder how orcs would look if they were three times as large?

name: ogre warrior
flavor: Ever wonder how ogres would look if they were twice as strong?

name: chief of ogres
flavor: Ever wonder how ettins would look if they lead a tribe for years?

desc: A nasty fey of cold disposition.

name: clay golem
desc: Bulky little fellow, but very sluggish.
flavor: I made you out of clay...
Ever wonder how ogre warriors would look if they had twice as many heads? And used magic?

desc: It's bitey.

name: invisible stalker
desc: You don't see a thing.

name: druid
desc: Ardent of nature.

name: steel golem
desc: Much more sophisticated magic and materials went into this creation, as you see it swiftly rolling around

name: master swordsman
desc: He's looking for a six-fingered man.
It's a unicorn with wings and no horn.

name: earth elemental
desc: How do you fight dirt?

name: air elemental
desc: It must have been the wind

name: stone golem
desc: The head stone's connected to the... spine stone.
Its horn is full of magic.
Standard blood sucking variety.
A ghostly black form.
It's more fire than bird.

name: ice elemental
desc: What's so scary about a bunch of icicles?
An avian terror of mythic repute.

name: roc
desc: An avian terror of mythic repute.
You could bounce a coin off those abs.
Kind of ugly.

name: orc champion
desc: A champion among orcs.

name: dire bear
desc: He's angrier now!!!

name: undead horror
desc: You need to stop looking at it before you go insane.
It doesn't have a head. But you do.
From the waist up, it doesn't look that bad.
Only the objects flying at your head alert you to its presence.

name: fire elemental
desc: Too hot to get close to.

name: light elemental
desc: Too bright to see.

name: iron golem
desc: It moves with heavy clonking steps.

name: drunken master
desc: Master Wong Fei-Hung.

name: mind slayer
desc: It licks your brain with its mind.

name: lesser wyrm
desc: A cross between a worm and a dragon.
A large lizard with a petrifying bite.

name: cordyceps
desc: A writhing fungus chokes the air with spores.

name: stranglevine
desc: Writhing tendrils seek to ensnare fresh prey.
The stare of the cockatrice is death.

name: greater basilisk
desc: A massive lizard with a petrifying bite.

name: hill giant
desc: You've seen bigger.

name: vampire master
desc: Worked his way up the vampire ranks, and has his very own brood now.

name: desilla's concubine
desc: A devoted follower of the sorceress Desilla.

name: fire golem
desc: Crafted from only the finest phlogiston.
A wooden demon with fingers like blades.
She'll take you to Valhalla.
A towering giant of stone.
flavor: You should have stayed out of the cloudspine.

desc: Body of a lion. Face of a giant eagle.

name: blood golem
desc: A creature of pure blood.

name: bog witch
desc: Vicious witch in the waters of the Great Bog.

name: skeleton lord
desc: Are those rubies in its eyes?
Out cruising for some ent-wives.
Not a dragon. But it will kill you like one.
flavor: Except the part where it kills you like a proper dragon would.

name: green dragon
desc: Just your standard green dragon.

name: sand wyrm
desc: Terror of the desert wastes.
It seeeeees you.
It has wings and a halo of light.

name: lich
desc: It was a wizard, once.
Such an incredible vitality.

name: vampire lord
desc: Master Vampires are its lackeys.

name: lich lord
desc: It was a wizard, once.

name: mithril golem
desc: Would be worth a fortune if you could even make a dent in it.
A mountain moves in the depths of the sea.
A servant of Morgoth.
It has wings and a halo of light.
extdesc: And more wings and another halo...
flavor: And more wings and another halo...

name: adamant golem
desc: Unbreakable.

name: Karnivex the BloodLock
desc: The weakest of the Archlocks built his reputation upon sheer slaughter.

name: Desilla the Vicious
desc: Among the Archlocks, desilla was more inclined to indulgence than conquest.

name: avatar
desc: Incarnation of a god.
In his house at R'lyeh dead Cthulhu waits dreaming.
Jazid's sole purpose is to kill the bearer of his compass.
flavor: Tales of Jazid were already ancient when Dhroze was entombed.

name: ancient lich
desc: Not one lich in a hundred live to reach such heights.

name: strativax slumbering
desc: He does not appear to notice your presence.

name: strativax waking
desc: The dragon's eyes begin to open.

name: strativax awaken
desc: Strativax now furious at your impetuous intrusion.

name: the gorborung
desc: The gargantuan entity in the depths of Mt. Gorbu never seen by mortal eyes.
flavor: Most agree it's best the Gorborung reside in darkness.

name: brittelwort the watcher
desc: The silent Brittelwort watches in the Felkill mountains, punishing all transgressions.
flavor: It bears a striking similarity to the lesser mummers.

name: dhrozen knight
desc: An immortal knight of Dhroz. Of fifty slain, one is knighted.
flavor: To escape Sarnagar one had only collect the pieces of a single set of Dhrozen armor.

desc: A voiceless form with a bare and twisted skull.
flavor: Believed to be a corrupted form of lesser Kell.

desc: A spirit cloaked in noxious nether.
a raw manifestation of death is fleeting, but terrible beyond measure.
The terror before the Wind Age.
The serpent that grips the earth in its scales.

name: wisp
desc: A ghostly wisp of summoned air.

name: large spider
desc: You can't tell if she looks hungry.

name: unicorn
desc: Its horn is full of magic.

name: magic blade
desc: It just floats there...

name: arcane serpent
desc: Summoned by magic, now fiercely loyal to you.

name: fulminant prism
desc: A floating prism of unstable magical power.

name: heroic ancestor
desc: A great hero of yore, inspiring awe with each strike.

name: queen bee
desc: Dbulm called them war wasps upon their discovery, thinking of their value in battle and tenacity in defense of their home. They've later been determined to be a type of bee, but the name has stuck as well as their honey.

name: war wasp
desc: Actually a type of bee, despite Dbulm's nomenclature.

name: phoenix egg
desc: Guard it carefully and the hatched phoenix will be grateful.

name: phoenix
desc: It's more fire than bird.

name: sand mite
desc: Oversized parasites of the dunes.

name: your own shadow
desc: Your own shadow, severed to fight at your side. Take care- it remains part of you.

name: rune of agony
desc: Suffering made manifest, indiscriminately flooding its surroundings with dark power.

name: nova
desc: A floating orb of unstable astral magic.

name: black hole
desc: A floating orb of unstable void magic.

name: imp
desc: Little demonic bastards.

name: quasit
desc: Like a demonic humanoid vulture.

name: grimstalk
desc: A wooden demon with fingers like blades.

name: demon
flavor: He should really trim his horns a bit, they are starting to get tangled.

name: stone wall
desc: Rock climbing's becoming popular these days.

name: beartrap
desc: Don't tread on me.

name: Greater Ice Elemental
desc: What's so scary about a bunch of icicles? Well... this.

name: Greater Air Elemental
desc: It must have been a lot, a lot of wind

name: Greater Fire Elemental
desc: Too hot to even look at.

name: Greater Earth Elemental
desc: How do you fight dirt the very ground you stand on?

name: Tempest Elemental
desc: Deafening, violent and unforgiving. One can only hope it'll pass in another direction. Truly an untamed disaster.

name: Mud Elemental
desc: Hulking mass, constantly shifting and dripping. Slow, but immense. Truly an untamed disaster.

name: Magma Elemental
desc: Relentless and everflowing. But calm and serene... at least until it's provoked. Truly an untamed disaster.

name: Ash Elemental
desc: Weight of what was lost, and hope of what shall be born anew. Aftermath of the disaster is never pretty.
